welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Selnica ob Dravi, a charming town nestled in the heart of Slovenia known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to immerse yourselves in the beauty of our city and experience all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maribor International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maribor International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thalerhof Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
